title: MongoDB Compass
details: A GUI for MongoDB that allows users to visualize, explore, and manage data in their databases.

title: MongoDB Atlas
details: A fully managed cloud database service for MongoDB, offering automated scaling, backups, monitoring, and secure deployment across cloud providers.

title: pgAdmin
details: Open-source GUI tool for administering and querying PostgreSQL databases.
source: Used to manage and query Postgres databases in academic and backend projects
